units.name: Death Guard Chaos Lord
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: plague bolt pistol; Astartes chainsword.

datasheet.name: Chaos Lord
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Desiccation Conduit (Aura)
datasheet.description: While an enemy unit is within Contagion Range of this model, at the end of the turn, roll one D6: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Chaos Lord
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.|Datasheet||

datasheet.description: While an enemy unit is within Contagion Range of this model, at the end of the turn, roll one D6: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.|Datasheet||

profiles.name: Death Guard Sorcerer In Terminator Armour

ranged_weapons.name: Curse of the Leper – focused witchfire

datasheet.name: Putrescent Vitality (Psychic)
datasheet.description: At the start of the Fight phase, you can roll one D6: on a 1, this PSYKER’s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in this PSYKER’s unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Pestilent Familiar (Psychic)
datasheet.description: Once per battle, after selecting targets for a Psychic weapon equipped by this model, until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Damage characteristics of that weapon by 2. Designer’s Note: Place a Pestilent Familiar token next to this model, removing it once this ability has been used.|Datasheet||

units.name: Death Guard Cultists
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: Cultist firearm; brutal assault weapon.

core.name: Remorseless
core.description: While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, each time you take a Battle-shock test for this unit, add 1 to that test.
core.parameter: 000001044 | 2 | | | Remorseless | While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, each time you take a Battle-shock test for this unit, add 1 to that test. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Diseased Icon
core.description: Melee weapons in the bearer’s unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.
core.parameter: 000001045 | 2 | | | Diseased Icon | Melee weapons in the bearer’s unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. | Wargear | |

core.name: Infectious Bloodshed
core.description: Each time this unit makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.
core.parameter: 000001045 | 3 | | | Infectious Bloodshed | Each time this unit makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. | Datasheet | |

core.name: POSSESSED
core.description: For the purposes of embarking within TRANSPORTS, each DEATH GUARD POSSESSED model counts as one TERMINATOR model.
core.parameter: 000001045 | 4 | | | POSSESSED | For the purposes of embarking within TRANSPORTS, each DEATH GUARD POSSESSED model counts as one TERMINATOR model. | Special (правая колонка) | |

core.name: Infused with the Blessings of Nurgle
core.description: Each time this model is selected to shoot or fight, after it has finished making its attacks, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is always considered to be within Contagion Range of this model.
core.parameter: 000001046 | 3 | | | Infused with the Blessings of Nurgle | Each time this model is selected to shoot or fight, after it has finished making its attacks, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is always considered to be within Contagion Range of this model. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Enraged Impact
core.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
core.parameter: 000001046 | 4 | | | Enraged Impact | Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Helbrute Fists
core.description: If this model is equipped with two Helbrute fists, those weapons have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability.
core.parameter: 000001046 | 5 | | | Helbrute Fists | If this model is equipped with two Helbrute fists, those weapons have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Self Repair
core.description: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.
core.parameter: 000001047 | 4 | | | Self Repair | At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Regenerating Monstrosities
core.description: At the start of each player’s Command phase, one model in this unit regains up to D3 lost wounds.
core.parameter: 000001048 | 3 | | | Regenerating Monstrosities | At the start of each player’s Command phase, one model in this unit regains up to D3 lost wounds. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Assault Ramp
core.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.
core.parameter: 000001049 | 3 | | | Assault Ramp | Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Annihilator
core.description: Each time a ranged attack made by this model is allocated to a MONSTER or VEHICLE model, you can re-roll the Damage roll.
core.parameter: 000001050 | 3 | | | Annihilator | Each time a ranged attack made by this model is allocated to a MONSTER or VEHICLE model, you can re-roll the Damage roll. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Scuttling Walker
core.description: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over friendly MONSTER and VEHICLE models and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.
core.parameter: 000001051 | 3 | | | Scuttling Walker | Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over friendly MONSTER and VEHICLE models and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there. | Datasheet | |

datasheet.name: Grandfather’s Blessing (Aura, Psychic)
datasheet.description: While a friendly DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit is within Contagion Range of this model, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.|Datasheet||

units.name: Typhus
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: master-crafted manreaper.

datasheet.name: The Destroyer Hive
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a melee attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: The Eater Plague (Psychic)
datasheet.description: In your Shooting phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this PSYKER (excluding units with the Lone Operative ability that are not part of an Attached unit and are not within 12" of this PSYKER) and roll one D6: on a 1, this PSYKER’s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.|Datasheet||

units.name: Lord Of Contagion
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: plagueblade.

profiles.name: Lord Of Contagion
profiles.base_size_description: 40mm if equipped with manreaper and orb of desiccation

datasheet.name: Vector of Disease
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Abundance of Sickness
datasheet.description: In the Fight phase, each time this model loses a wound, roll one D6: on a 4+, the closest enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model suffers 1 mortal wound.|Datasheet||

units.name: Malignant Plaguecaster
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: plague bolt pistol; Plague Wind; corrupted staff.

datasheet.name: Gift of Contagion (Psychic)
datasheet.description:
In your Shooting phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this PSYKER and roll one D6: on a 1, this PSYKER’s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the start of your next Shooting phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes a melee attack, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.|Datasheet||
000001055|4|||Pestilent Fallout (Psychic)|In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks made with its Plague Wind scored a wound against an enemy INFANTRY unit, until the start of your next turn, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Host of Plagues
datasheet.description: At the start of the battle round, select one of the abilities in the Host of Plagues section (see left). Until the start of the next battle round, this model has that ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Lord of the Death Guard (Aura)
datasheet.description:
While a friendly DEATH GUARD unit is within 6" of this model, that unit can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).|Datasheet||
000001377|7|||SUPREME COMMANDER|If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.|Special (правая колонка)||
000001377|8|||Miasma of Pestilence (Aura)|While a friendly DEATH GUARD unit is within 6" of this model, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, models in that unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.|Primarch||

datasheet.description:
While a friendly DEATH GUARD unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.|Primarch||

datasheet.name: Diseased Cover
datasheet.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Fortification
datasheet.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army: That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Line-breaker
datasheet.description: When making ranged attacks, this model can target enemy units within Engagement Range of it with Blast weapons (provided no other friendly units are also within Engagement Range of that enemy unit). In addition, when making ranged attacks, this model does not suffer the penalty to its Hit rolls for being within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.|Datasheet||

units.name: Sokar-pattern Stormbird
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: hellstrike missile battery; 3 twin heavy bolters; 4 twin lascannons; armoured hull.

datasheet.name: Aerial Assault
datasheet.description: Each time a unit with the Deep Strike ability disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.|Datasheet||

units.name: Sicaran Battle Tank
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; Herakles-pattern autocannon; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Armoured Spearhead
datasheet.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets an enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and, if that unit is within range of an objective marker you do not control, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.|Datasheet||

units.name: Mastodon
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 heavy flamers; 2 lascannons; siege melta array; skyreaper battery; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Inviolable Transport
datasheet.description: Once per battle round, when an attack is allocated to this model, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.|Datasheet||

units.name: Leviathan Dreadnought
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 heavy flamers; 2 grav-flux bombards; armoured feet.

datasheet.name: Duty Eternal
datasheet.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

units.name: Fellblade
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: demolisher cannon; Fellblade accelerator cannon; 2 quad lascannons; twin heavy bolter; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Rolling Fortress
datasheet.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model from your army, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fellblade model, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.|Datasheet||

units.name: Relic Contemptor Dreadnought
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 heavy plasma cannons; armoured feet.

units.name: Whirlwind Scorpius
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Scorpius multi-launcher; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Pinning Bombardment
datasheet.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks made with its Scorpius multi-launcher scored a hit against an enemy INFANTRY unit, that unit must take a Battle-shock test.|Datasheet||

units.name: Xiphon Interceptor
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 twin lascannons; Xiphon missile battery; armoured hull.

datasheet.name: Interceptor
datasheet.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can Fly, add 1 to the Hit roll.|Datasheet||

units.name: Rapier Carrier
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: boltgun; quad heavy bolter; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Powerful Volley
datasheet.description: Each time this model shoots in your Shooting phase, provided it Remained Stationary this turn, all [HEAVY] weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.|Datasheet||

units.name: Storm Eagle Gunship
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: twin heavy bolter; 2 twin hellstrike launchers; vengeance launcher; armoured hull.

datasheet.name: Armoured Resilience
datasheet.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

units.name: Sicaran Venator
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; Venator neutron laser; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Ferocious Assault
datasheet.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Hit roll.|Datasheet||

units.name: Typhon
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: dreadhammer siege cannon; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Sunderer of Fortresses
datasheet.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a VEHICLE, improve the Strength and Damage characteristic of that attack by 1 (if that attack targets a FORTIFICATION unit, improve the Strength and Damage characteristics of that attack by 2 instead).|Datasheet||

units.name: Sicaran Punisher
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; Punisher rotary cannon; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Rotating Death
datasheet.description: This model’s Punisher rotary cannon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability when targeting INFANTRY units.|Datasheet||

units.name: Falchion
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 quad lascannons; twin heavy bolter; twin Falchion volcano cannon; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Titan-killer
datasheet.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack with its twin Falchion volcano cannon that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, that attack has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.|Datasheet||
